author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Get Adventurous With Exciting Leisure Experiences In Dubai During DSSTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Get Adventurous With Exciting Leisure Experiences In Dubai During DSS Published on : Monday, August 31, 2015
Thrill-seekers of varied tastes can discover plenty of exciting activities to do in Dubai, with the emirate’s vast line-up of leisure experiences that make it one of the most favourite spots for adventure-lovers from around the world.
Known for its world-class recreational facilities, Dubai offers a wide range of indoor and outdoor leisure attractions – drawing numerous families to the emirate each year who seek unique experiences that generate a high sense of thrill and excitement.
As part of the on-going 18th edition of Dubai Summer Surprises (DSS), organised by the Dubai Festivals and Retail Establishment (DFRE), an agency of the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing (DTCM), visitors can avail themselves of fantastic promotions to make their leisure experiences all the more rewarding and memorable.
Amazing deals and discounts are up for grabs on a number of activities including Dubai’s signature dhow cruise experiences with ‘Captain Jack – Dhow Cruise’ and ‘Burj Al Arab – Catamaran Cruise’ that offer visitors a glimpse into the city’s rich culture and heritage. Other family- centric activities include a close encounter with the graceful dolphins at Dubai Dolphinarium, a visit to the first educational city Children’s City, the opportunity for kids to register for child-friendly Stable Management Courses at Dubai Polo and hours of football fun at GOAL! Junior – all at discounted rates.
Those looking for adrenaline-pumping experiences can head to Dubai Autodrome to enjoy tempting DSS offers on Kart racing adventures and also dive into high energy underwater activities such as diving and enrol in dive courses in addition to snorkelling, swimming and much more at Al Boom Diving and make a splash in other water sports activities at Watercooled UAE.
DSS 2015 is now in its final week and will conclude on 5 September after offering families from around the world a packed calendar of shopping and entertainment experiences as well as many winning opportunities.
Source:- Visit Dubai
